title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 1 - Deshaun Watson Should Get Out, Tom Brady's Super Bowl Prep, Willie McGinest
itunes:title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 1 - Deshaun Watson Should Get Out, Tom Brady's Super Bowl Prep, Willie McGinest
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin explains why quarterback Deshaun Watson has every right to force himself out of Houston. Also, Tom Brady’s Super Bowl prep rises above all. Finally, three-time Super Bowl champion linebacker Willie McGinest on the pressures of playing in the big one. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
